title.rendered: Hibiki 30 Years The Beauty of Japan Limited edition

content.rendered:
The Kacho Fugetsu Hibiki 30 Year Old is the very top of the Hibiki range and part of their appreciation of the beauty of Japanese nature. The special limited release was exclusive to Travel Retail in 2015.

This is the oldest Kacho Fugetsu of the Hibiki. Collect also the 12, 17 and 21 years old Kacho Fugetsu as well!
Hibiki 30 year old is the cream of crop. It was awarded the Trophy at the International Spirits Challenge in 2004,2006 and 2008.
And the coveted title “World’s Best Blended Whisky” at the World Whiskies Award 2007 and 2008.
Only 100 bottles ever released of this awesome whisky and decanter!
See also the other versions of the Hibiki 30 we all have in stock:
Hibiki 30 Regular
Hibiki 30 Aritayaki
Hibiki 30 Gold

excerpt.rendered:
Bottle size :700 ml
Bottle strength :43%
Distillery :Hibiki
Region :Asian
Whisky :Blend
